text: The Hopman Cup is an yearly international team tennis tournament played in Perth, Western Australia in January each year. ==Champions== Year Winning Country Players 2015 Jerzy Janowicz & Agnieszka Radwańska 2014 Jo-Wilfried Tsonga & Alizé Cornet 2013 Fernando Verdasco & Anabel Medina Garrigues 2012 Tomáš Berdych & Petra Kvitová 2011 John Isner & Bethanie Mattek-Sands 2010 Tommy Robredo & María José Martínez Sánchez 2009 Dominik Hrbatý & Dominika Cibulková 2008 Mardy Fish & Serena Williams 2007 Dmitry Tursunov & Nadia Petrova 2006 Taylor Dent & Lisa Raymond 2005 Dominik Hrbatý & Daniela Hantuchová 2004 James Blake & Lindsay Davenport 2003 James Blake & Serena Williams 2002 Tommy Robredo & Arantxa Sánchez Vicario 2001 Roger Federer & Martina Hingis 2000 Wayne Ferreira & Amanda Coetzer 1999 Mark Philippoussis & Jelena Dokić 1998 Karol Kučera & Karina Habšudová 1997 Justin Gimelstob & Chanda Rubin 1996 Goran Ivanišević & Iva Majoli 1995 Boris Becker & Anke Huber 1994 Petr Korda & Jana Novotná 1993 Michael Stich & Steffi Graf 1992 Jakob Hlasek & Manuela Maleeva-Fragniere 1991 Goran Prpić & Monica Seles 1990 Emilio Sánchez & Arantxa Sánchez Vicario 1989 Miloslav Mečíř & Helena Suková == Other websites== * Hopman Cup Category:Tennis tournaments in Australia Category:Perth, Western Australia Category:1989 establishments in Australia
title: Hopman Cup
